title: My LoL life since 11/18/2015
body:
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} Won't ever play again because I can't ever play again.

https://gyazo.com/9b18bd058cf0009df5d97f9b484aebc6

replies.body:
There's not a lot of info to go off of here except for those screenshots, but I'm assuming that you're referring to the fact that you aren't able to queue up for any games. Since you're also disconnected from chat, it looks like your network is having some problems getting a solid connection with our servers. 

Let's first look over some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you could make a few adjustments that would give your network a smoother timing connecting with our servers.

Oh no, its not a network issue. It's just been like this ever since my first full ban after 5 years of playing. I've made support tickets asking and pleading riot for a restoration. usually in like a 6 month frequency. You'd figure after 2 years of silent reforming some would have taken enough notice to at least fix the account.

Every thing is accessible including the store and runes/masteries but chat and playing a game.

its kind of like being on probation where its slightly jailing you and at the same time you can do what you want (sort of). Quite hilarious in my opinion. I've NEVER seen or heard of any one ever actually having the same problem. Genuinely banned accounts are practically inaccessible.

My bad for assuming the connection issue! I couldn't see that your account had been banned from those screenshots. 

After looking over your account, it does look like this was rightfully banned. There were numerous warnings sent and chat restrictions placed to help give you time to reform and rethink the things that were being said. After so many of them, the decision was made to place this ban.

True, it was placed. I have no complaints about my lack of former behavior 2 years ago. Simply asking the community for votes. This forum link is already being shared beyond the forum. I just wonder till how many years I should have to wait because I refuse to play/make a new account.

If you don't mind sharing and casting a vote it'd be appreciated.

I really love the new platform of the client by the way, really makes me want to play, now.

I also have nothing to show for what I did to show my wrongs. All I get is this, https://gyazo.com/1ad3fbfb930bf814413062778b3699f1. Another strange thing. Says nothing about being banned, just chat restriction.
